title: Sans with elaborate swashes
content:
The beginnings of a typeface. It's only the skeleton but you get the gist of it.  
Looking for feedback. Any suggestions would be much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819232442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/forTypohpile2_6587.jpg)
  
I've been calling it TENDERFOOT, unfortunately that name is taken.

Thanks in Advance!

Also feel free to check my online portfolio at [heyjose.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819232442/http:/www.heyjose.com/)
author: Jojoto

comments.content: It would be great to have a pdf to look at the characters a little closer and possibly some example settings of how it is intended to be used. It's got great personality and I love the swashes.

The typeface in all of it's bodies seems very exiting from what the jpg.

The swashes however are very similar to a Wall Decor product from "Veer"

[http://www.veer.com/products/merchdetail.aspx?image=VPR0005040](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819232442/http:/www.veer.com/products/merchdetail.aspx?image=VPR0005040)

I really like the geometric / natural curve look.
